attributes.action: Increase the sentence for carrying a knife to ten years
attributes.additional_details: Reason being to many young lads are losing their lives
attributes.background: Increase the sentence for carrying a knife to ten years

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase penalties for knife crime offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618505

If you'd like a petition calling specifically for a 10-year sentence, you could start a new petition making clear if you'd like to see a 10-year minimum sentence, or a mandatory 10-year sentence for all cases.
